results.description: Defender Ashley Hutton says that Northern Ireland feel "a wee bit deflated" after a goalless draw against Wales in Euro 2021 qualifying.

results.description: Northern Ireland's Jonny Evans says Michael O'Neill's imminent departure has not come as a surprise to the squad.

results.description: IFA chief executive Patrick Nelson says 'we'll cross that bridge when we come to it' when asked about Michael O'Neill remaining as Northern Ireland manager if they qualify for Euro 2020.
results.title: 'That is not a question we raised' - Nelson on O'Neill managing NI at Euro 2020

results.description: A look at five potential candidates to succeed Michael O'Neill as Northern Ireland manager following news of his appointment as Stoke City boss.
results.title: Michael O'Neill: Five potential candidates to replace Northern Ireland manager

results.description: Former Northern Ireland striker Gerry Armstrong praises Michael O'Neill's attention to detail as NI boss agrees to take over at Stoke City.

results.description: New Stoke City manager Michael O'Neill says he is used to having to "punch above his weight" from his time in charge of the Northern Ireland team.
results.title: 'I'm used to massive challenges' - NI boss O'Neill relishing Stoke job
